column1: Little Goat Diner////While waiting I wandered to the bakery that's attached to the restaurant to get a coffee.  Their coffee is DELICIOUS!!!  It's roasted by Dark Matter Coffee so says their 'cup condom'.  Terrific stuff... good for dusting cob webs from your head
column2: warming you ever so nicely and will probably take paint off walls.  The good stuff!!!!
